armour 0.name: Cloth Tunic
armour 0.description: A flimsy cloth shirt, providing minimal protection in it's best condition but allowing for completely free movement

armour 1.name: Cloth Hood
armour 1.description: A loose cloth hood providing minimal protection, but also allowing for free movement

armour 2.name: Cloth Leggings
armour 2.description: A pair of light, cloth leggings that provide little protection but maximize movement

armour 3.name: Padded Tunic

armour 4.name: Padded Leggings
armour 4.description: Cloth leggings with added leather pads to help with damage absorption

armour 5.name: Padded Hood
armour 5.description: A cloth hood with added leather pads to increase protection from the elements

armour 6.name: Hide Chestpiece
armour 6.description: A tough hide chestpiece that covers only the most vital organs to allow for moderate mobility

armour 7.name: Hide Skirt
armour 7.description: A thick, hide skirt crafted to allow free leg movement with adequate protection

armour 8.name: Hide Headress
armour 8.description: A decorative hide headdress adorned with feathers and bones

armour 9.name: Leather Chestpiece
armour 9.description: A thick leather chestpiece that provides improved protection at the cost of lower mobility

armour 10.name: Leather Leggings
armour 10.description: Tough leather trousers with imbedded pads to provide further protection from weapons and hostile environments

armour 11.name: Leather Helmet
armour 11.description: A protective leather helm with minimal frills to improve otherwise mediocre mobility

armour 13.name: Studded Leggings
armour 13.description: Very tough leather leggings, reinforced with metal studs.  Heavy, but the best protection at a manageable weight

armour 14.name: Studded Helm
armour 14.description: A very solid leather helm, reinforced with metal studs for extra stability

armour 15.name: Iron Chestplate
armour 15.description: A tough iron plate often used by mercenaries as it is both fairly affordable and very durable.

armour 16.name: Iron Leggings

armour 17.name: Iron Helm
armour 17.description: A tough iron helm, easily able to handle the struggles of most battles
